sourcesContent:
import { Badge, Box, Chip, Grid, Typography } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' import { ADD_ITEMS } from '../../../utils/constants' import styles from "./style.module.scss" import { Favorite, HeartBroken } from '@mui/icons-material' import { images } from "../../../utils/images" import appleimage from "../../../assets/apple.jpeg" const AddToCart = () => { const itemsList = [ { name: 'Burger', price: 130, favorite: true, amount: 1, desc: "Juicy, big, loaded with toppings of my choice.", image: images.Burger }, { name: 'Pizza', price: 850, favorite: true, amount: 1, desc: "Pizza is an Italian food that was created in Italy (The Naples area).", image: images.Pizza }, { name: 'Apple', price: 50, favorite: false, amount: 1, desc: "An Apple a Day keeps the doctor away", image: images.Apple }, { name: 'Book', price: 460, favorite: false, amount: 1, desc: "Reading books is a good habit as it give knowledge", image: images.Book }, { name: 'Shoes', price: 2600, favorite: true, amount: 2, desc: "I tie my shoes daily because i have a job", image: images.Shoes }, { name: 'Comb', price: 50, favorite: false, amount: 1, desc: "Comb is used to comb the hairs" }, { name: 'Hair Dryer', price: 1550, favorite: false, amount: 1, desc: "To dry wet hairs we can use hair dryer", image: images.HairDryer }, { name: 'Laptop', price: 55000, favorite: true, amount: 1, desc: "Laptop is an electronic instrument", image: images.Laptop }, { name: 'Cocomo', price: 25, favorite: false, amount: 5, desc: "Cocomo mujhee bhi do", image: images.Cocomo }, ] return ( <>
{ADD_ITEMS}
{ itemsList.map(item => ( <> {item.name}
{ item.favorite ? : }
{item.desc}
 )) } ) } export default AddToCart
